text: Maria Menounos (born June 8, 1978) is an American/Greek actress, television host, and journalist. She has worked for news programs. These include Extra and Access Hollywood. She has also been in many movies. Menounos was born in Massachusetts. In 2017, she underwent surgery for a brain tumor. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:Journalists from Massachusetts Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Maria Menounos
